item.title: Arrstack
item.description: Need a fast and easy way to download Linux ISOs? The arrstack is a lightweight tool that lets you find, download, and manage Linux distributions in just a few clicks. No clutter. No hassle. Just ISOs. Jokes aside the arrstack is a set of aplications that connect together to provide a simple way to download and manage content. Quick Setup Here is my docker compose file to run the stack:
